items.summary:
Ensure the three user photo files for Gift 2 exist in the deployed frontend static assets folder at exactly these paths and filenames (case-sensitive):
- frontend/public/assets/generated/IMG_0131-1.jpeg
- frontend/public/assets/generated/IMG_4617-1.jpeg
- frontend/public/assets/generated/IMG_0156-1.jpeg

Verify and (if needed) correct Gift 2 configuration so the Gift 2 gallery is driven only by HER_PHOTOS and uses exactly these filenames in this order: ['IMG_0131-1.jpeg','IMG_4617-1.jpeg','IMG_0156-1.jpeg'] (no placeholder filenames).
Rebuild and redeploy the frontend and validate on the live site that Gift 2 shows the three user photos (not the “Image not found” fallback).
